Sinopse: When Max (Yelchin) learns that his new live-in girlfriend, Evelyn (Greene) is controlling and manipulative, he is afraid to end the relationship. The new romance gets tricky when Evelyn comes back from the grave and insists on continuing their once relationship by all means.—PallasBrenna
